ComicInfo.Title: Special Missions Part Four: Destro
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Special Missions Part Four: Destro: In Qnrrh near Trucial Abysmia and Benzheen, Destro demonstrates MARS' technology to the skeptical Sheik Ali. A sudden attack on Ali's base compromises his defenses, resulting in Destro and the Baroness saving Ali's life. Ali assumes Destro planned the attack to prove his superior technology and grants him a defense contract. Destro informs Baroness he actually hadn't planned the attack but had given information to Ali's power-hungry brother in Pakistan, resulting in the attack.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 10:54:40. [CVDB678369] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:36:02. [Issue ID 1841904]
ComicInfo.Inker: Alisson Rodrigues,Jagdish Kumar,Netho Diaz,Alisson Rodrigues,Jagdish Kumar
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jagdish Kumar,James Brown (J. Brown),James Offredi,John Royale,Larry Hama,Marcelo Ferreira
